analyzed: tasmā rakkhita cittassa sammā saṅkappa gocaro ti rakkhita cittassa sammā saṅkappa gocaro

original: bhavissatīti yujjati, sammāsaṅkappagocaro sammādiṭṭhi bhavissatīti yujjati, sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro
analyzed: bhavissati iti yujjati sammāsaṅkappa gocaraḥ sammādiṭṭhi bhavissati iti yujjati sammādiṭṭhi purekkhāro

original: viharanto udayabbayaṁ paṭivijjhissatīti yujjati, udayabbayaṁ paṭivijjhanto sabbā
analyzed: viharantaḥ udayabbayam paṭivijjhissati iti yujjati udayabbayam paṭivijjhantaḥ sabbā

original: Sabbā duggatiyo jahanto sabbāni duggativinipātabhayāni samatikkamissatīti yujjatīti.
analyzed: sabbāḥ duggatiyaḥ jahantaḥ sabbāni duggati vinipāta bhayāni samatikkamissati iti yujjati iti
